description: Prof. Skocpol presents a detailed analysis of the rising Tea Party in the US and how Tea Party followers are different from Democrats.
itunes:subtitle: Prof. Skocpol presents a detailed analysis of the rising Tea Party in the US and how Tea Party followers are different from Democrats.

itunes:author: Theda Skocpol
title: The Tea Party and the Remaking of Republican Conservatism
